page.title: 16MARYC.CLUB MOTHERS'TODDLERS
page.content: A group for mothers and toddlers meet in the Scout Hut on Thursday mornings. The group started in 1983 with only two mothers. Now there are 24 mothers and 27 children from 0-3yrs. old. The aim is for mothers to meet and gain support from other mothers, as they discuss their problems in a relaxed atmosphere. It is also good for the children to play with others. It was the first group of this kind in the district. The children play with soft toys, books,puzzles, push chairs etc. Sometimes they go to the Swimming Pool at Camphill. Funds are raised by means of a workstall in Stonehaven square. They have a Christmas Party, Easter- get-together and Summer Picnic.
